item.title: Faaast Penguin for Xbox Series launches December 11
item.content:encoded:
https://www.gematsu.com/2024/12/faaast-penguin-for-xbox-series-launches-december-11

Currently available for PlayStation 5, Switch, and PC.

The Xbox Series version of free-to-play multiplayer racing game Faaast Penguin will launch on December 11, developer historia announced.

Faaast Penguin first launched for PlayStation 5 and PC via Steam and Epic Games Store on September 20, followed by Switch on on October 3. The game is currently in its second season.

Get the latest details below.

About the Game

Faaast Penguin is an exhilarating and chaotic survival action race where countless rival penguins clash! Set in various global resort locations, players race through high-speed water slides, desert pyramids, jungle waterfalls, and even above the clouds! Use attacks, Ultimate Rides, and shortcuts to reach the finish line faster than anyone else!

Limited-Time Event: “High-Speed Merry Christmaaas!” Kicks Off!

From December 4 to 25, the limited-time event “High-Speed Merry Christmaaas!” will be live after maintenance concludes!

Christmas-themed items like “Santa” and “Red-Nosed Reindeer” make their debut.

Complete limited-time challenges and shop for festive costumes to celebrate the holiday season!

Limited-Time Item Code Distribution!

The consumable item “Christmas Lights” from the limited-time event “High-Speed Merry Christmaaas!” will be available via item codes once maintenance is complete! We’re also distributing the “Round and round floats” as a reward for reaching 500,000 pre-registrations! Be sure to enter the codes during the event periods and try them out in the game!

  • Christmas Lights
    • Item Code: EVX4 FFFF PPPP LCMD
    • Redemption Deadline: December 25, 2024 at 10:00 p.m. PST
  • Round and round floats
    • Item Code: CAXX FFFF PPPP RNBN
    • Redemption Deadline: December 31, 2024 at 9:00 p.m. PST

How to Redeem:

  1. Open the menu and select “Settings & Support.”
  2. Under the “Game” section, select “Redeem” within “Item Code” under “Support.”
  3. Enter the item code.

item.title: DoDonPachi True Death coming to Switch on December 19 in Japan
item.content:encoded:
https://www.gematsu.com/2024/12/dodonpachi-true-death-coming-to-switch-on-december-19-in-japan

  • Switch

CAVE Interactive-developed bullet hell shoot 'em up published by Live Wire.

Live Wire will release a Switch version of CAVE Interactive-developed bullet hell shoot ’em up DoDonPachi True Death via Nintendo eShop on December 19 in Japan for 4,400 yen, the company announced. It will only support Japanese as a language option.

DoDonPachi True Death, or DoDonPachi SaiDaiOuJou, first launched for arcades on April 20, 2012 in Japan, followed by Xbox 360 on May 30, 2013. The arcade version was localized and released by exA-Arcadia in November 2020 worldwide.

Watch the Switch announcement trailer below.

Switch Announce Trailer

item.title: CRYSTAR for PS5 now available in the west
item.content:encoded:
https://www.gematsu.com/2024/12/crystar-for-ps5-now-available-in-the-west

  • PS5

A surprise release from publisher Spike Chunsoft.

The PlayStation 5 version of CRYSTAR is now available via PlayStation Store in the west for $19.99 / £15.99 / €19.99. It is published by Spike Chunsoft.

A PlayStation 5 version of CRYSTAR was first announced by publisher FuRyu for a February 27, 2025 release in Japan. Prior to today, a western release was not announced.

In Japan, CRYSTAR for PlayStation 5 will be available both physically and digitally. It is currently unclear whether Spike Chunsoft is planning a later physical release for the west, as Spike Chunsoft has yet to announce anything about the PlayStation 5 version at all.

Here is an overview of the game, via PlayStation Store:

About

For when I weep, then I am strong.

A girl named Rei and Mirai, her little sister, are dragged into the afterworld of Purgatory. To save her sister, Rei signs a contract with the Demons of Purgatory to fight the monsters infesting their world. Rei and her fellow Executors must face their pasts and confront their tears to overcome the Torments and monsters ahead of them. Will Rei save her sister’s Soul before it’s too late?

Key Features

  • Fight Through Your Tears in This Action RPG – Combat the Souls of the dead as you explore the afterworld of Purgatory. Play as four different characters and unlock their memories to learn the truth behind their stories and secrets.
  • Power Through Grief – The battle system includes an otherworldly being who fights alongside you. Gather your grief and endure Torments to summon your Guardian!
  • Tears Give You Strength – Crying will help you take down monsters and empower your equipment. In CRYSTAR, tears aren’t a sign of weakness, but of strength.
  • Over 30 Costume Downloadable Contents Included – The PlayStation 5 version includes over 30 costume downloadable contents! Cute skins like swimsuits, Santa costumes and official comic outfit are included. Some costumes unlock special effects that are advantageous for smoother gameplay, such as purchasing items at a discounted price or changing the appearance rate of the special monsters.

item.title: Bleach: Rebirth of Souls launches March 21, 2025
item.content:encoded:
https://www.gematsu.com/2024/12/bleach-rebirth-of-souls-launches-march-21-2025

  • PC
  • PS4
  • PS5
  • Xbox Series

Pre-orders now available.

Fighting action game Bleach: Rebirth of Souls will launch for PlayStation 5, Xbox Series, PlayStation 4, and PC via Steam on March 21, 2025, publisher Bandai Namco and developer Tamsoft announced.

Pre-orders are now available in the following editions:

  • Standard Edition (physical or digital) ($59.99 / £54.99 / €69.99)
    • A copy of the game
    • Pre-order bonus: Thousand-Year Blood War Toshiro Hitsugaya & Yoruichi Shihoin Costume Set
  • Digital Deluxe Edition ($84.99 / £79.99 / €94.99)
    • A copy of the game
    • Four additional playable characters
    • Seven-day early access for downloadable content characters
    • Two-Type Soul Crystal Set 1
      • Attack Soul Crystal (Light Scratch)
      • Defense Soul Crystal (Endure)
    • Two-Type Soul Crystal Set 2
      • Spiritual Pressure Soul Crystal (Informal)
      • Special Soul Crystal (Tailwind)
  • Digital Ultimate Edition ($99.99 / £94.99 / €109.99)
    • A copy of the game
    • Four additional playable characters
    • Seven-day early access for downloadable content characters
    • Two-Type Soul Crystal Set 1
      • Attack Soul Crystal (Light Scratch)
      • Defense Soul Crystal (Endure)
    • Two-Type Soul Crystal Set 2
      • Spiritual Pressure Soul Crystal (Informal)
      • Special Soul Crystal (Tailwind)
    • Two-Type Soul Crystal Set 3
      • Attack Soul Crystal (Flawless)
      • Defense Soul Crystal (Perfection)
    • Thousand-Year Blood War Costume Set
    • Rebirth of Souls Costume Set
  • ❮
  • ❯

Here is an overview of the game, via Bandai Namco:

About

Awaken the blade within you and reverse your fate in Bleach: Rebirth of Souls! Engage in thrilling battles with powerful sword abilities and characters from this legendary anime franchise.

Key Features

  • Unleash Your Sword – Choose your favorite character and unleash their unique sword abilities! Take advantage of each character’s unique abilities and command the flow of battle to find an opening that spells defeat for your enemies.
  • Defeat Enemies with a Single Strike – In Bleach: Rebirth of Souls, a single strike can spell defeat for you or your opponent. The more desperate the situation, the more powerful you become.
  • Reverse Fate and Awaken Your Power – The more desperate the situation, the more powerful you become. Overturn the tide of battle and unlock new forms and new blades in the heat of battle to bring victory from the edge of defeat!
  • Experience the Bleach Story from the Beginning – Relive the main story of Bleach from Ichigo’s rise as a Soul Reaper in the Substitute Soul Reaper Arc to the climactic battle against Sosuke Aizen in the Arrancar Arc. Unlock deeper insights into the characters of Bleach with Secret Story mode, revealing the moments that shaped their personalities.

Watch a new trailer below. View a new set of screenshots at the gallery.

Release Date Trailer

English

Japanese
